title: Nearer My God to Thee

author.name: Sarah Flower Adams
author.bio: Sarah Flower Adams was an English poet and hymn writer, best known for her work 'Nearer, My God, to Thee,' which has been sung at many significant events including funerals and memorials.

lyrics:
Nearer, My God, to Thee,
Nearer to Thee!
E'en though it be a Cross
That raiseth me;
Still all my song shall be,
Nearer, my God, to Thee,
Nearer, to Thee!

Though like the wanderer,
The sun gone down,
Darkness comes over me,
My rest a stone,
Yet in my dreams I'd be
Nearer, my God, to Thee,
Nearer to Thee!

There let my way appear,
Steps unto Heaven;
All that Thou sendest me,
In mercy given
Angels to beckon me
Nearer, my God, to Thee,
Nearer to Thee!

Then with my waking thoughts,
Bright with Thy praise,
Out of my stony grief,
Bethel I'll raise;
So by my woes to be
Nearer, my God, to Thee,
Nearer to Thee!
